thread.section_title: Rush Order Tees Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rush Order Tees | rushordertees.com
thread.title: Yong Shin
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Yong Shin

author: Yong Shin
title: Yong Shin
text:
Wasn't expecting much from a company I found via a Google ad, but was pleasantly surprised. Process was fast and easy, and the shirts were received several days ahead of schedule.
While we did have a hiccup because the shirts were not printed according to our understanding (a misunderstanding on our part, most likely), the customer service at this company seems very fast. Very short wait times, no endless automated message crap, etc. A manager named Lex helped us get our order sorted to satisfaction, and was extremely kind and prompt in her emails and phone calls.
Definitely planning to order from this company again in the future.
